description:
Matthew McConaughey and Woody Harrelson star as Rust Cohle and Martin Hart, two Louisiana detectives whose lives collide and entwine during a 17-year hunt for a killer. The investigation of a bizarre murder in 1995 is framed and interlaced with the testimony and story of the detectives in 2012, when the case is reopened. The eight episode anthology series also stars Michelle Monaghan as HartÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s wife Maggie, who struggles to keep her family together as the men in her life become locked in a cycle of violence and obsession.
